de.patricklammers.vorlesungsplan.app.actionbar

Class ActionBarHelperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.patricklammers.vorlesungsplan.app.actionbar.ActionBarHelper
      • de.patricklammers.vorlesungsplan.app.actionbar.ActionBarHelperBase

  • public class ActionBarHelperBase
extends ActionBarHelper
    A class that implements the action bar pattern for pre-Honeycomb devices.

        public void setRefreshActionItemState(boolean refreshing)

        Specified by:

      • getMenuInflater

        public MenuInflater getMenuInflater(MenuInflater superMenuInflater)
        Returns a MenuInflater that can read action bar metadata on pre-Honeycomb devices.
        Overrides:
        getMenuInflater in class ActionBarHelper

      • getActionBarCompat

        private ViewGroup getActionBarCompat()
        Returns the ViewGroup for the action bar on phones (compatibility action bar). Can return null, and will return null on Honeycomb.

      • addActionItemCompatFromMenuItem

        private View addActionItemCompatFromMenuItem(MenuItem item)
        Adds an action button to the compatibility action bar, using menu information from a MenuItem. If the menu item ID is menu_refresh, the menu item's state can be changed to show a loading spinner using de.dhbw.mosbach.app.actionbar.example.android.actionbarcompat.ActionBarHelperBase#setRefreshActionItemState(boolean).

      • setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled

        public void setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(boolean value)
        Overrides:
        setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled in class ActionBarHelper
